ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine listens to the action at the ark, To the pit with this, he exclaimed as the waiting got to him. In wolf mode he ran toward the transport pods.

Lunarpine listens to the action at the ark, "To the pit with this," 
he exclaimed as the waiting got to him.

In wolf mode he ran toward the transport pods. There was no way he 
was going to let the others get scrapped without him at least being 
there to pay his respects.

He jumped in the pod and set the coordinates.  "Open a personal 
message for Kluster, I'm heading for the Ark, see ya when I get back."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing:;
> 
> Pulls up from the dive bomb on Ares and swoops down with talons 
> extended to claw the back of Zeus.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > ::Torca sees Zues firing at Prowl and Shadow Wing::
> > Torca:  Watch out guys!
> > ::He moves between them and shoots his dorsal gun at Zeus.  He 
> falls over, 
> > but not before firing a shot at Zeus::
